import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react' import RestaurantFinder from '../APIs/RestaurantFinder' import { RestaurantsContext } from '../context/RestaurantContext' const AddReview = () => { const [name,setName] = useState("") const [reviewBody,setReviewBody] = useState("") const [rating,setRating] = useState("") return (
setName(e.target.value)} id="name" placeholder='name' type="text" className="form-control"/>
) } export default AddReview
